topic_words: ['atmospheric ammonia', 'air quality', 'satellite observations', 'secondary inorganic aerosols', 'emission estimates', 'long-term trends', 'urban environment']
title: Atmospheric NH3 in urban Beijing: long-term variations and implications for secondary inorganic aerosol control
abstract:
Our study examined the long-term trends of atmospheric ammonia in urban Beijing from 2009 to 2020. We found that the trends did not match satellite data or emission estimates, revealing complexities in ammonia sources. While seasonal variations in ammonia were temperature-dependent, daily variations were correlated with water vapor. We also found an increasing contribution of ammonia reduction, emphasizing its importance in mitigating the effects of fine particulate matter in Beijing. 
 Ammonia (NH3) has major effects on the environment and climate. In situ measurements of NH3 concentrations taken between June 2009 and July 2020 at an urban site in Beijing were analyzed to study its long-term behavior, responses to meteorological conditions, and influences on the formation of secondary inorganic aerosols (SIAs). The 11-year average NH3 mixing ratio was 26.9±19.3 ppb (median 23.5 ppb). The annual average NH3 mixing ratio increased from 2009 to 2017 by 50 % and then decreased by 49 % from 2017 to 2020. Notably, the long-term trend for NH3 at the ground level did not align with the trends derived from satellite observations and emission estimates. The NH3 concentration exhibited a stronger correlation with the daily variation in water vapor (H2O) concentration than with air temperature. Thermodynamic modeling revealed the nonlinear response of SIAs to NH3, with increased sensitivity when its concentration was reduced to 40 % of the initial level. Although reducing NH3 concentrations can improve air quality during winter, controlling acid gas concentrations has a greater effect than controlling NH3 concentrations on reducing SIA concentrations, until NH3 and acidic gas concentrations are reduced below 80 % of their current levels. Nevertheless, the increased mass proportion of ammonium salts in SIAs during the observation period indicates that future control measures for NH3 concentrations may need to be prioritized in Beijing.
authors: Ziru Lan;Xiaoyi Zhang;Weili Lin;Xiaobin Xu;Zhiqiang Ma;Jun Jin;Lingyan Wu;Yangmei Zhang
explanation: 该研究通过分析北京市区2009年至2020年的长期大气氨气浓度数据，探讨了氨气浓度变化趋势、气象条件影响以及对二次无机气溶胶形成的影响。研究发现，地面氨气浓度长期趋势与卫星观测和排放估算结果不一致，表明氨气来源存在复杂性。氨气浓度与水汽浓度日变化相关性强于气温，表明水汽对氨气浓度变化有重要影响。研究还发现，降低氨气浓度可以改善冬季空气质量，但控制酸性气体浓度对减少二次无机气溶胶浓度的影响更大。然而，二次无机气溶胶中铵盐的比例增加表明，未来北京市可能需要优先控制氨气浓度。

topic_words: ['storm surge', 'tide gauge', 'coastal areas', 'artificial intelligence', 'data-driven model', 'numerical model']
title: ASM-SS: The First Quasi-Global High Spatial Resolution Coastal Storm Surge Dataset Reconstructed from Tide Gauge Records
abstract:
Storm surges (SSs) cause massive loss of life and property in coastal areas each year. High spatial resolution and long-term SS records are the basis for assessing such events. However, tide gauges can provide limited SS information due to sparse and uneven distributions. Based on artificial intelligence technology and tide gauges, a high spatial coverage SS dataset was generated for period from 1940 to 2020, which can provide possible alternative support for deepening our understanding of SSs. 
 Storm surges (SSs) cause massive loss of life and property in coastal areas each year. High spatial resolution and long-term SS records are the basis for deepening our understanding of this disaster. However, such global or quasi-global scale information could only be simulated by global numerical models until now due to the sparse and uneven distribution of tide gauge stations. In this paper, the all-site modeling framework for the data-driven model was implemented on a quasi-global scale within areas severely affected by SSs caused by tropical and extratropical cyclones. Compared to single-site modeling data-driven models, it can provide SS information for ungauged points. Compared to numerical models, it can reconstruct long-term SSs faster with fewer computational resources. We generated the first high spatial resolution (every 10 km per station along the coastline) hourly SS dataset ASM-SS (all-site modeling storm surge) within 45° S to 45° N, whose record length is over 80 years from 1940 to 2020. Assessments indicate that for 95th extreme SSs, the precision of this model (medians of correlation coefficients, root mean square errors, and mean biases are 0.66, 9 cm, and -4.4 cm, respectively) is slightly better than that of the state-of-the-art global hydrodynamic model (medians are 0.58, 10.8 cm, and -4.3 cm); for annual maximum SSs, our model is more stable than the numerical model with overall root mean square error and coefficient of determination optimizing by around 23.1 % and 14.8 %, respectively. This dataset could provide possible alternative support for coastal communities to estimate return levels of extremes, analyze variations (intensity, frequency, and trend) of SSs, and other relevant applications. The ASM-SS dataset is available at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13293595 (Yang et al., 2024a).
authors: Lianjun Yang;Taoyong Jin;Weiping Jiang
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究的是利用人工智能技术和潮汐数据，重建了1940年至2020年期间全球近岸区域的暴潮数据集。该数据集可以用于评估暴潮的强度、频率和趋势，以及其他相关应用。论文没有涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析。

topic_words: ['remote sensing', 'drought', 'spatial patterns', 'temporal patterns', 'fused datasets', 'satellite observations', 'land surface', 'vegetation']
title: Urbanization-induced spatial and temporal patterns of local drought revealed by high-resolution fused remotely sensed datasets
authors: Shuzhe Huang;Siqi Wang;Jing Chen;Chao Wang;Xiang Zhang;Jiefeng Wu;Chunlong Li;Aminjon Gulakhmadov;Dev Niyogi;Nengcheng Chen
explanation: 该研究使用高分辨率融合遥感数据来揭示城市化导致的局部干旱的时空模式。它利用遥感技术分析城市化对干旱的影响，包括空间分布和时间变化。研究可能涉及使用卫星数据，如降水数据、植被指数和土壤水分数据，来监测和分析城市化对干旱的影响。

title: Global mapping of human-transformed dike-pond systems
authors: Yang Xu;Lian Feng;Hongwei Fang;Xiao-Peng Song;Fabian Gieseke;Ankit Kariryaa;Stefan Oehmcke;Luke Gibson;Xiating Jiang;Ruimin Lin;R. Iestyn Woolway;Chunmiao Zheng;Martin Brandt;Rasmus Fensholt
explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明这是一篇关于人类改造的堤塘系统全球测绘的论文。它与大气环境遥感技术没有直接关系。该研究可能涉及地理空间分析、土地利用变化、生态系统服务等方面，但与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析无关。

title: A machine learning downscaling framework based on a physically constrained sliding window technique for improving resolution of global water storage anomaly
authors: Gangqiang Zhang;Tongren Xu;Wenjie Yin;Sayed M. Bateni;Changhyun Jun;Dongkyun Kim;Shaomin Liu;Ziwei Xu;Wenting Ming;Jiancheng Wang
explanation: 这篇论文提出了一种基于物理约束滑动窗口技术的机器学习降尺度框架，用于提高全球水储量异常的解析度。它利用机器学习技术，结合卫星观测数据和物理约束条件，对全球水储量异常进行降尺度处理，从而提高其空间分辨率。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为卫星观测数据是该框架的关键输入，而水储量异常是重要的气候变化指标，与大气环境密切相关。

title: An efficient and generalisable approach for mapping paddy rice fields based on their unique spectra during the transplanting period leveraging the CIE colour space
authors: Huapeng Li;Jujian Huang;Ce Zhang;Xiangyu Ning;Shuqing Zhang;Peter M. Atkinson
explanation: 该论文主要关注利用遥感技术识别水稻田，特别是利用水稻移植期的独特光谱特征。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，因为没有涉及大气成分分析、卫星观测或空气质量监测等方面。

title: Mapping aboveground biomass in Indonesian lowland forests using GEDI and hierarchical models
authors: Paul B. May;Michael Schlund;John Armston;Martyna M. Kotowska;Fabian Brambach;Arne Wenzel;Stefan Erasmi
explanation: 该研究使用GEDI卫星数据和分层模型来估算印度尼西亚低地森林的地上生物量。它主要关注的是森林生态学和遥感技术，而不是大气环境遥感。

title: A novel AMSR2 retrieval algorithm for global C-band vegetation optical depth and soil moisture (AMSR2 IB): Parameters' calibration, evaluation and inter-comparison
authors: Mengjia Wang;Philippe Ciais;Frédéric Frappart;Shengli Tao;Lei Fan;Rui Sun;Xiaojun Li;Xiangzhuo Liu;Huan Wang;Jean-Pierre Wigneron
explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种新的算法，用于利用AMS2卫星的C波段数据反演全球植被光学厚度和土壤湿度。该算法涉及参数校准、评估和与其他方法的比较，属于大气环境遥感技术领域，利用卫星观测数据进行地面参数反演。

title: Bridging spatio-temporal discontinuities in global soil moisture mapping by coupling physics in deep learning
authors: Zushuai Wei;Linguang Miao;Jian Peng;Tianjie Zhao;Lingkui Meng;Hui Lu;Zhiqing Peng;Michael H. Cosh;Bin Fang;Venkat Lakshmi;Jiancheng Shi
explanation: 该研究论文探讨了利用深度学习技术结合物理模型来弥合全球土壤水分映射中时空不连续性的问题。论文的重点在于利用卫星观测数据和深度学习算法来构建更准确、更全面的土壤水分地图，这与大气环境遥感技术中的卫星观测和数据分析密切相关。

topic_words: ['CO2 emissions', 'power plants', 'lidar', 'aerosols', 'atmospheric composition', 'remote sensing', 'air quality monitoring']
title: Quantifying CO<sub>2</sub> emissions of power plants with Aerosols and Carbon Dioxide Lidar onboard DQ-1
authors: Ge Han;Yiyang Huang;Tianqi Shi;Hongyuan Zhang;Siwei Li;Haowei Zhang;Weibiao Chen;Jiqiao Liu;Wei Gong
explanation: 该研究使用搭载在DQ-1卫星上的气溶胶和二氧化碳激光雷达来量化发电厂的二氧化碳排放。这是一种利用卫星遥感技术监测大气成分和空气质量的应用，旨在通过测量二氧化碳和气溶胶的浓度来评估发电厂的排放情况。

topic_words: ['vegetation optical depth (VOD)', 'soil moisture', 'P-band radiometry', 'dense crop canopies']
title: P-band radiometry for enhanced vegetation optical depth (VOD) and soil moisture retrieval in dense crop canopies
authors: Xiaoji Shen;Lei Fan;Tengteng Zuo;Tianyu Cui;Jiayi Wu;Nan Ye;Foad Brakhasi;Xiaoling Wu;Liujun Zhu;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Jeffrey P. Walker;Ke Zhang
explanation: 该研究主要关注利用P波段辐射计来增强密集作物冠层中的植被光学厚度（VOD）和土壤水分反演。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要集中在农业遥感领域。

topic_words: ['land surface temperature', 'remote sensing', 'satellite observations', 'angular reconstruction', 'temporal reconstruction']
title: An integrated method for angular and temporal reconstruction of land surface temperatures
authors: Zunjian Bian;Shouyi Zhong;J.-L. Roujean;Xiangyang Liu;Sibo Duan;Hua Li;Biao Cao;Ruibo Li;Yongming Du;Qing Xiao;Qinhuo Liu
explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种整合方法，用于对地表温度进行角度和时间重建。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测来获取地表温度信息，并通过角度和时间重建来提高数据质量和精度。地表温度是研究气候变化、生态系统和水文循环的重要参数，因此该研究对大气环境遥感应用具有重要意义。

title: Patterns and Trends in Northern Hemisphere River Ice Phenology from 2000 to 2021
authors: Xinchi Wang;Lian Feng
explanation: 该论文研究了北半球河流冰冻现象的时间变化趋势，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。论文使用卫星观测数据来分析河流冰冻的开始和结束时间，以及冰冻期的长度。这些数据可以帮助我们了解气候变化对河流冰冻的影响，以及冰冻变化对水资源管理和生态系统的影响。

title: Characterizing the kinematics of active rock glaciers in Daxue Shan, southeastern Tibetan plateau, using SAR interferometry and generalized boosted modeling
authors: Jiaxin Cai;Xiaowen Wang;Tingting Wu;Renzhe Wu;Guoxiang Liu
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究了位于青藏高原东南部的“大雪山”地区活跃岩冰川的运动学特征。它利用了合成孔径雷达干涉测量 (SAR interferometry) 技术来测量岩冰川的运动速度，并使用广义增强模型来分析其运动模式。该研究与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要关注的是地质学和冰川学领域。

title: CascadeDumpNet: Enhancing open dumpsite detection through deep learning and AutoML integrated dual-stage approach using high-resolution satellite imagery
authors: Siwei Zhang;Jun Ma
explanation: 该研究使用高分辨率卫星图像，结合深度学习和自动机器学习技术，开发了一种名为CascadeDumpNet的双阶段方法，用于识别和检测露天垃圾场。该研究主要关注的是利用遥感技术进行垃圾场识别，与大气环境遥感技术如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等关联性较弱。

topic_words: ['downward shortwave radiation', 'rugged terrain', 'clouds', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'air quality monitoring']
title: Downward shortwave radiation modeling over rugged terrain with clouds
authors: Guangjian Yan;Chunqiang Zhao;Qing Chu;Xihan Mu;Yingji Zhou;Yanan Liu;Xuejun Wang;Donghui Xie
explanation: 该论文研究了在云层覆盖下崎岖地形上的向下短波辐射建模。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为向下短波辐射是影响地表能量平衡和大气成分的关键因素。该研究可能使用卫星观测数据来验证模型，并最终应用于大气成分分析和空气质量监测等领域。

title: Accurate reconstruction of satellite-derived SST under cloud and cloud-free areas using a physically-informed machine learning approach
authors: Chih-Chieh Young;Yu-Chien Cheng;Ming-An Lee;Jun-Hong Wu
explanation: 该论文研究使用物理信息机器学习方法来重建卫星观测的海表温度（SST），即使在云层覆盖和无云区域。这表明该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是在利用卫星数据进行海表温度监测方面。

title: Improved global estimation of seasonal variations in C3 photosynthetic capacity based on eco-evolutionary optimality hypotheses and remote sensing
authors: Yihong Liu;Jing M. Chen;Mingzhu Xu;Rong Wang;Weiliang Fan;Wenyu Li;Lucas Kammer;Colin Prentice;Trevor F. Keenan;Nicholas G. Smith
explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用遥感技术来估计全球范围内C3植物光合能力的季节性变化。C3植物是地球上最常见的植物类型，其光合作用对大气中的二氧化碳浓度有着重要影响。论文基于生态进化最优性假设，利用遥感数据来估计不同地区的C3植物光合能力，并分析其季节性变化规律。这项研究对于理解全球碳循环和气候变化具有重要意义。

title: A mixing scheme of ice particle models for global ice cloud measurements
authors: Banghai Wu;Yu Wang;Xiaoye Fan;Shi Liu;Yixiao Fu
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注全球范围内的冰云测量，并提出了一种混合冰粒子模型方案。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为冰云是地球大气组成的一部分，对气候变化和辐射平衡具有重要影响。该研究可能利用卫星观测数据来验证和改进冰粒子模型，从而提高对冰云的理解和预测能力。

title: Exploring vegetation chlorophyll fluorescence with leaf dorsiventrality
authors: Hanyu Shi
explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明它与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。研究重点是利用叶片背腹面差异来探索植物叶绿素荧光，这是一种重要的植物生理指标，可通过卫星遥感技术进行监测。叶绿素荧光与植物的光合作用、生长状况和环境胁迫密切相关，因此该研究可用于监测植物健康状况、评估生态系统功能以及监测大气环境质量。

title: High-resolution mapping of forest structure and carbon stock using multi-source remote sensing data in Japan
authors: Hantao Li;Takuya Hiroshima;Xiaoxuan Li;Masato Hayashi;Tomomichi Kato
explanation: 这篇论文主要关注利用多源遥感数据对日本森林结构和碳储量进行高分辨率测绘。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，因为其重点在于利用遥感数据分析森林生态系统，而不是直接研究大气成分或空气质量。

topic_words: ['urban land surface temperature', 'thermal infrared data', 'SDGSAT-1', 'high-spatial resolution']
title: Urban land surface temperature retrieval with high-spatial resolution SDGSAT-1 thermal infrared data
authors: Xiaoying Ouyang;Zhongchang Sun;Shugui Zhou;Youjun Dou
explanation: 该论文主要关注的是利用高分辨率的SDGSAT-1卫星热红外数据反演城市地表温度，属于遥感技术在城市热环境研究中的应用，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

title: Time-series China urban land use mapping (2016–2022): An approach for achieving spatial-consistency and semantic-transition rationality in temporal domain
authors: Shuping Xiong;Xiuyuan Zhang;Yichen Lei;Ge Tan;Haoyu Wang;Shihong Du
explanation: 该研究主要关注中国城市土地利用变化的时空分析，利用时间序列数据，通过空间一致性和语义转换的合理性来进行城市土地利用的动态监测。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要侧重于地理信息系统和遥感技术在城市规划和管理中的应用。

topic_words: ['atmospheric composition', 'carbon dioxide', 'satellite observations', 'OCO-2', 'terrestrial carbon cycle', 'remote sensing']
title: The Orbiting Carbon Observatory-2 (OCO-2) and in situ CO<sub>2</sub> data suggest a larger seasonal amplitude of the terrestrial carbon cycle compared to many dynamic global vegetation models
authors: Ruixue Lei;Jeralyn Poe;Deborah Huntzinger;Junjie Liu;Stephen Stich;David F. Baker;Leyang Feng;Dylan C. Gaeta;Ziting Huang;Scot M. Miller
explanation: 该研究利用轨道碳观测卫星-2（OCO-2）和地面二氧化碳浓度数据，研究了陆地碳循环的季节性变化幅度。研究结果表明，OCO-2观测到的陆地碳循环季节性变化幅度比许多动态全球植被模型模拟的结果更大。这表明，OCO-2等卫星遥感技术在监测大气二氧化碳浓度和研究陆地碳循环方面具有重要意义。

topic_words: ['Urban Heat Island', 'Satellite Observations', 'Remote Sensing', 'Surface Temperature', 'Land Surface Temperature']
title: A global urban heat island intensity dataset: Generation, comparison, and analysis
authors: Qiquan Yang;Yi Xu;TC Chakraborty;Meng Du;Ting Hu;Ling Zhang;Yue Liu;Rui Yao;Jie Yang;Shurui Chen;Changjiang Xiao;Renrui Liu;Mingjie Zhang;Rui Chen
explanation: 这篇论文研究了全球城市热岛效应的强度，并利用了遥感技术，特别是卫星观测数据来生成和分析城市热岛强度数据集。论文的重点在于利用卫星数据来研究城市热岛效应，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是利用卫星观测来分析地表温度和城市热环境变化。

title: First lunar-light mapping of nighttime dust season oceanic aerosol optical depth over North Atlantic from space
authors: Meng Zhou;Jun Wang;Xi Chen;Yi Wang;Peter R. Colarco;Robert C. Levy;Steven D. Miller
explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用月球光照射来测量北大西洋上空夜间沙尘季期间的海上气溶胶光学厚度。这是一种利用卫星遥感技术来监测大气环境，特别是空气质量和气溶胶成分的方法。

title: An integrated framework for estimating the hourly all-time cloudy-sky surface long-wave downward radiation for Fengyun-4A/AGRI
authors: Qi Zeng;Jie Cheng;Hao Sun;Shengyue Dong
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用风云四号A星（FY-4A）搭载的农业星载辐射计（AGRI）传感器来估算全天候、全时段的云层覆盖下的地表长波向下辐射。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为地表长波向下辐射是影响大气温度和能量平衡的重要因素，同时也是评估大气成分和空气质量的重要指标。论文中提到的“cloudy-sky”表明研究考虑了云层对辐射的影响，这对于准确评估地表辐射至关重要。

title: Enhancing wheat crop physiology monitoring through spectroscopic analysis of stomatal conductance dynamics
authors: K.H. Cheng;Zhuangzhuang Sun;Wanlu Zhong;Zhihui Wang;Marco Visser;Shuwen Liu;Zhengbing Yan;Yingyi Zhao;Ruinan Zhang;Jingrong Zang;Shichao Jin;Jin Wu
explanation: 该研究的重点是利用光谱分析技术监测小麦作物的生理指标，特别是气孔导度。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，因为其关注的是植物本身的生理过程，而不是大气成分或卫星观测。

title: The high spatial resolution Drought Response Index (HiDRI): An integrated framework for monitoring vegetation drought with remote sensing, deep learning, and spatiotemporal fusion
authors: Zhenheng Xu;Hao Sun;Tian Zhang;Huanyu Xu;Dan Wu;JinHua Gao
explanation: 该研究提出了一种名为HiDRI的高空间分辨率干旱响应指数，利用遥感、深度学习和时空融合技术监测植被干旱。HiDRI整合了多种数据源，包括卫星遥感数据和地面观测数据，并利用深度学习模型提高了干旱监测的精度和空间分辨率。该研究属于大气环境遥感技术范畴，因为它利用卫星观测数据来监测植被干旱，而植被干旱与大气环境密切相关。

title: River ice breakup classification using dual- (HH&HV) or compact-polarization RADARSAT Constellation Mission data
authors: Torsten Geldsetzer;Nicolas Svacina;Simon Tolszczuk-Leclerc;Joost van der Sanden
explanation: 该研究利用 RADARSAT 星座任务的双极化 (HH&HV) 或紧凑极化数据对河流冰裂进行分类。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要关注的是水文过程和遥感技术在水文监测中的应用。

topic_words: ['fire', 'atmospheric state', 'hyperspectral infrared sounding', 'narrow-band imagery', 'satellite observations', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
title: Characterizing fire and fire atmospheric states from space using collocated hyperspectral infrared sounding and narrow-band imagery
authors: Xuyang Zhou;Qing Yue;King-Fai Li;Evan Fishbein;Xiuhong Chen;Lin Tan;Sally Newman;Eric Fetzer;Yuk L. Yung
explanation: 该研究使用同步的超光谱红外探测和窄带成像技术，从太空对火灾及其大气状态进行表征。这表明该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是利用卫星观测进行大气成分分析和空气质量监测。

title: Editorial Board
explanation: 由于没有提供论文标题和摘要，无法判断其与大气环境遥感技术的关系。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
title: Corrigendum to “Biomass estimation of abandoned orange trees using UAV-SFM 3D points” [Int. J. Appl. Earth Obs. Geoinf. 130 (2024) 103931]
authors: J. Estornell;J. Martí;E. Hadas;I. López-Cortés;B. Velázquez-Martí;A. Fernández-Sarría
explanation: 该论文主要研究使用无人机结构化光三维重建技术来估计废弃橙树的生物量，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。论文中使用的技术主要用于获取三维空间信息，而没有涉及大气成分分析、卫星观测或空气质量监测等方面。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
title: A rational delineation method for active land blocks on the southeastern margin of the Tibetan Plateau based on high-precision GNSS horizontal velocity fields
authors: Lingxiao Zhang;Wei Qu;Rong Huang;Zhen Ye;Xiaohua Tong
explanation: 该研究主要关注青藏高原东南缘的陆块活动，利用高精度GNSS水平速度场进行理性划分。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关联。
